posts.texto: JavaScript® es el lenguaje interpretado orientado a objetos desarrollado por Netscape que se utiliza en millones de páginas web y aplicaciones de servidor en todo el mundo. JavaScript de Netscape es un superconjunto del lenguaje de scripts estándar de la edición de ECMA-262 3 (ECMAScript) que presenta sólo leves diferencias respecto a la norma publicada.
.NET is the development platform used by millions of developers to create apps and services on any device and OS, with amazing performance and great developer productivity.

AngularJS fits the definition of a framework the best, even though it's much more lightweight than a typical framework and that's why many confuse it with a library. AngularJS is 100% JavaScript, 100% client-side and compatible with both desktop and mobile browsers. So it's definitely not a plugin or some other native browser extension.
